scripts.migrate:dev: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma migrate dev --schema .work/prisma/schema
scripts.migrate:deploy: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma migrate deploy --schema .work/prisma/schema
scripts.migrate:resolve: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma migrate resolve --schema .work/prisma/schema
scripts.migrate:status: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma migrate status --schema .work/prisma/schema
scripts.migrate:diff: pnpm run workdir:build && prisma migrate diff --schema .work/prisma/schema
